## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G15840](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G15840)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PIFI</u>
- **Gene Name:** post-illumination chlorophyll fluorescence increase
- **Description:**   post-illumination chlorophyll fluorescence increase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2093287
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
